headline.main: RED ARMY STIFFENS; Repulses Nazi Assaults in Kushchevka Area of the Caucasus HITS BACK IN BEND OF DON Scores Executed After Large 5th Column Is Found -- Foe Says Advance Goes On NAZI DRIVE SLOWED TO SOUTH OF ROSTOV

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Monday, Aug. 3 -- A communique issued today indicated little change anywhere on the southern front, but said that the Red Army was exacting a heavy toll of German troops and materiel. Press dispatches reported that Soviet air squadrons rushed to the Western Caucasus had slowed the German drives in the Kushchevka and Salsk areas, south and southeast of Rostov.
abstract: USSR Army stiffens; Ger attacks repulsed, Kushchevka area; counter-attack at Don bend; Gers drop parachutists behind USSR lines; scores executed by USSR Army after large 5th-column is found, southern area
